title: Does Your Shop generate the sales before you open them or when you reveal them?

replies.body: Oooooooo that is a good question indeed. I had to do a some digging, but I believe those options are decided when you first log in while Your Shop is active. With that being said, I didn't have a hand in developing that system so I'm not 100% sure! ^_^
Alright, thanks for the response! Was curious if it was worth playing games on some accounts to try and sway the odds a little towards champs I like. :P
